overview:
Nick Wild leads product development for all platforms.

Wild joined Recargo from Microsoft’s Xbox Console Software Team, where he was Senior Program Manager focused on bringing digital advertising products to the gaming console space. He also managed the development of Xbox Live’s Party System for social online gameplay.

Prior to joining Microsoft, Wild was Vice President of Information Systems and Technology at House of Blues Entertainment, where he led the development of the company’s electronic marketing and ticketing platforms. Wild joined House of Blues during its pioneering period of work in the digital music space where, as Senior Director of Technology, he oversaw the development of products for digital downloads, content syndication and pay-per-view streaming.
